definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement

sentences.english: The only thing these interests he is cash.
sentences.chinese: 一个使他感兴趣的事件根本那是多挣钱。

sentences.english: It doesn’t interest me if the story you’re telling me is true.
sentences.chinese: 你说的是真是假我不感兴趣。

sentences.english: Bao-chai seemed interested in the fact that Bao-yu was there.
sentences.chinese: 宝钗似乎对宝玉当时在场这件事更感兴趣。

sentences.english: We have special interest in your light industrial products.
sentences.chinese: 我们对你方轻工产品特别感兴趣。

sentences.english: You were very interested in the trial?
sentences.chinese: 你对那场审判很感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: But I am more interested in painting now.
sentences.chinese: 但是我现在对绘画更感兴趣了。

sentences.english: If he is interested in something, he may use his palm to prop the head.
sentences.chinese: 如果对某事感兴趣，就会用手掌支住头部。

sentences.english: I'm interested. It's a good story, Connie.
sentences.chinese: 我非常感兴趣，这是一个很好的题材，康妮。

sentences.english: Do you have any interest in sports?
Cavic was not interested the protest.
sentences.chinese: 卡维奇对抗议不感兴趣。

sentences.english: Elly:Yes, Mr. Smith. And we're very much interested.
sentences.chinese: 是的，史密斯先生，我们对此很感兴趣。

sentences.english: We are interested in producing signage known as Electroluminescent ( EL ).
sentences.chinese: 我们对生产电致发光信号感兴趣。

sentences.english: I am much interested in water-skiing.
sentences.chinese: 我对滑水运动很感兴趣。

sentences.english: I don't like electricity，but I'm interested in the law of universal gravitation.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌电学，但我对万有引力定律感兴趣。

sentences.english: This was closely followed by activities of interest and the weather.
sentences.chinese: 紧接下来的是感兴趣的活动以及天气。

sentences.english: So a note to remember, men with beards and mustaches need not apply where I am concerned!
sentences.chinese: 所以，留胡须的男人绝不会是我感兴趣的。

definition: interest (desire to know about sth)/interest (thing in which one is interested)/hobby/CL:個|个[ge4]
to feel strongly about/to be fond of/obsession/deep commitment
not knowing anything at all (idiom); completely ignorant/without an inkling
to take one's fancy/to be to one's liking
way of looking at a thing/view/opinion/CL:個|个[ge4]
to become exhilarated (idiom); in high spirits/full of zest
to have a special fondness (for sth)
there is no harm in/might as well
